name: Heiwa Pachinko World 3
overview: Heiwa Pachinko World 3 is a pachinko gambling game for the Super Famicom and the third of Shouei System's Heiwa Pachinko World games for the system. Like its predecessors, it features virtual approximation of real-life pachinko machines manufactured by the Heiwa Corporation. Players can train for the real thing by playing their virtual facsimiles over and over, with various tips and tricks provided by the game for maximum payouts. The machines included in this edition of the series also have a slot machine component, which requires an additional set of strategies.
